org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.addressing
Interface IAeAddressingSerializer

All Superinterfaces:
IAeWsAddressingConstants
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeWSAddressingSerializer
public interface IAeAddressingSerializer
extends IAeWsAddressingConstants

Responsible for serializing a set of WS-Addressing headers to a SOAPHeader element. This is used when creating SOAP messages.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface org.activebpel.wsio.IAeWsAddressingConstants
WSA_ANONYMOUS_ROLE, WSA_DEFAULT_ACTION, WSA_FAULT_ACTION_, WSA_NAMESPACE_URI, WSA_NAMESPACE_URI_2004_03, WSA_NAMESPACE_URI_2004_08, WSA_NS_PREFIX, WSA_RELATIONSHIP_TYPE, WSA_REPLY_RELATION, WSA_RESPONSE_RELATION
 
Method Summary

          Serializes the WS-Addressing information to a SOAPHeader.
